properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed for handling the seq sort
properties.entry: (assert (forall ((i U) (s U)) (! (=> (< (u2i i) 0) (= (seqGet s i) seqError)) :pattern ((seqGet s i))))) (assert (forall ((i U) (s U)) (! (=> (>= (u2i i) (seqLen s)) (= (seqGet s i) seqError)) :pattern ((seqGet s i)))))

(assert (forall ((s1 U) (s2 U)) (= (seqLen (seqConcat s1 s2)) (+ (seqLen s1) (seqLen s2))))) (assert (forall ((s1 U) (s2 U) (i U)) (=> (< i seqLen(s1)) (= (seqGet (seqConcat s1 s2) i) (seqGet s1 i))))) (assert (forall ((s1 U) (s2 U) (i U)) (=> (>= i seqLen(s1)) (= (seqGet (seqConcat s1 s2) i) (seqGet s2 (- i (seqLen s1))))))
(assert (forall ((u U)) (= (seqLen (seqSingleton u)) 1))) (assert (forall ((u U)(i U)) (! (=> (= i (i2u 0)) (= (seqGet (seqSingleton u) i) u)) :pattern ((seqGet (seqSingleton u) i)))))
